scripts.build-getSHE: npm run prebuild && npm run build-getSHEsecret && npm run upload-getSHEsecret
scripts.build-postSHE: npm run prebuild && npm run build-postSHEsecret && npm run upload-postSHEsecret
scripts.build-getE2E: npm run prebuild && npm run build-getE2Esecret && npm run upload-getE2Esecret
scripts.build-postE2E: npm run prebuild && npm run build-postE2Esecret && npm run upload-postE2Esecret
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run combined-build && npm run combined-upload
scripts.combined-build: npm run build-getSHEsecret && npm run build-postSHEsecret && npm run build-getE2Esecret && npm run build-postE2Esecret
scripts.build-getSHEsecret: esbuild getSHEsecrets.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/getSHEsecret.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-getSHEsecret.zip getSHEsecret.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-postSHEsecret: esbuild postSHEsecrets.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/postSHEsecret.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-postSHEsecret.zip postSHEsecret.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-getE2Esecret: esbuild getE2Esecrets.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/getE2Esecret.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-getE2Esecret.zip getE2Esecret.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.build-postE2Esecret: esbuild postE2Esecrets.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/postE2Esecret.js && cd dist && zip -r $SHORT_SHA-postE2Esecret.zip postE2Esecret.js* && rm -rf *.js*
scripts.combined-upload: npm run upload-getSHEsecret && npm run upload-postSHEsecret && npm run upload-getE2Esecret && npm run upload-postE2Esecret
